summary: Full-stack developer skilled in building end-to-end web applications with a strong foundation in the MERN stack. Experienced in designing scalable interfaces, developing modular backend architectures, and creating AI-augmented systems. Actively seeking internship opportunities to contribute to production-grade software.

projects.name: Domio
projects.description: AI-enabled home rental platform inspired by real-world property booking systems.
highlights: Architected a secure role-based dashboard for Hosts and Users using JWT authentication.
Implemented real-time booking workflows including cancellation and refund logic.
Integrated Cloudinary for optimized media handling, reducing page load times by 30%.
Designed modular backend controllers to handle complex CRUD operations for property listings.

projects.name: Kisan Sakhi
projects.description: AI-powered assistance platform for farmers providing weather and crop insights.
highlights: Developed a mobile-first UI to assist rural users with low-bandwidth accessibility.
Integrated real-time weather forecasting and crop disease detection APIs.
Built a community module allowing farmers to share insights and discover government schemes.

projects.name: GitHub Profile Visualizer
projects.description: Interactive dashboard visualizing GitHub user activity and statistics.
highlights: Engineered a dashboard to retrieve and visualize raw data from the GitHub Public API.
Created interactive charts for language usage and contribution activity using Recharts.
Implemented graceful error handling for API rate limits and empty data states.

projects.name: Adaptive Quiz System
projects.description: Adaptive difficulty quiz application based on user performance.
highlights: Designed an algorithm to dynamically adjust question difficulty based on previous answers.
Built a performance analytics view to show users their progression curve.
Optimized state management to ensure zero lag during question transitions.
